page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content: { { Pickering}is a small town, with a population of about 5500 people. It is a{market town}with a market every Monday. The people of Pickering are friendly and it is easy to go for walks in the countryside. it is a {quiet}town most of the time, but on Saturdays and Sundays a lot of people come on the trains from Grosmont, Goathland and Levisham to see Pickering.Other people come to town to catch the trains and to go up to the moors. Visitors to Pickering like to look at the church, which is quite big and look at the paintings on the walls.There is a church choir. There is a castle, which is quite old. There is also a swimming pool and football pitch, which is used by lots of people in the town. I think the town would be better if we had a professional team.
